alert.note: Alert for Pottawatomie; Riley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 14 at 3:20PM CDT until July 14 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Kansas, including the following counties, Pottawatomie and Riley. * WHEN...Until 715 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 319 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Manhattan.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
